text: Adam Chase is a writer and producer best known for his work on the TV series Friends, for which he was nominated for three Emmy Awards in addition to winning two People's Choice Awards. He started working on the show in the first season and left after the completion of season six. He has written and produced for all four major U.S. TV networks. He is currently a Co-Executive Producer on the series Mom from Warner Bros. Television. ==References== ==External links== * *Adam Chase on the Emmys webpage Category:Living people Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:American male television writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Adam Chase (writer)
